SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Client
Represents a customer in the system.
ClientController
The ClientController class manages operations related to Client objects, including user authentication, registration, and database interactions.
ClientControllerTest
ClientControllerTest is a test class for testing the functionality of the ClientController class.
ClientDao
The ClientDao interface defines methods for interacting with the database related to customer entities.
ClientWrapper
The ClientWrapper class serves as a container for a list of Client objects.
DatabaseConf
Utility class for managing the database configuration and schema for the application.
Drink
Represents a drink product with a specific size.
FileManagement
The FileManagement class provides methods for importing and exporting customer and ingredient data to and from various file formats, including XML and CSV.
Ingredient
Represents an ingredient used in products, including its name, unique identifier, and any allergens associated with it.
JdbcClientDao
JdbcClientDao is an implementation of the ClientDao interface that provides data access operations for managing customer records in a relational database.
JdbcOrderDao
JdbcOrderDao is an implementation of the OrderDao interface that provides data access operations for managing orders in a relational database.
JdbcProductDao
JdbcProductDao is an implementation of the ProductDao interface that provides a comprehensive set of methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on products, ingredients, and allergens stored in a relational database using JDBC.
main.MainApplication
The main.MainApplication class serves as the entry point for the Pizzeria application.
Order
Represents an order in the system, containing details about the customer, order lines, payment method, and order state.
OrderController
The OrderController class handles operations related to orders and order lines.
OrderControllerTest
Test class for OrderController.
OrderDao
The OrderDao interface provides methods for interacting with the database regarding orders and order lines.
OrderLine
Represents a line item in an order, including the product and its quantity.
OrderState
Represents the various states of an order in the system.
Pasta
Represents a Pasta product in the system.
Payable
Represents a general payment method.
PayByCard
Represents a payment method where the payment is made using a card.
PayByCash
Represents a payment method where the payment is made using cash.
PaymentMethod
Represents the payment methods available in the application.
Pizza
Represents a Pizza, which is a type of Product.
Product
Abstract class representing a product in the system.
ProductController
The ProductController class manages operations related to products and ingredients.
ProductDao
The ProductDao interface provides methods for interacting with the database regarding products and ingredients.
Size
Enum representing the different sizes available for a product.
